panels.description: Normalized load, averaged over 15 minutes

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("15min_load") FROM "long"."cpu_load" WHERE "type" = 'normalized' AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Load - 15min

panels.description: Normalized load, averaged over 5 minutes

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("05min_load") FROM "long"."cpu_load" WHERE "type" = 'normalized' AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Load - 5min

panels.description: Normalized load, averaged over 1 minutes

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("01min_load") FROM "long"."cpu_load" WHERE "type" = 'normalized' AND "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Load - 1min

panels.description: I/O wait CPU load ~ time spent (%) waiting for I/O operations to complete, normalized as per CPU cores quantity

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("iowait_seconds"),1s)/MAX("cores_count") AS "SUB" FROM "long"."cpu_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - Wait

panels.description: System CPU load ~ time spent (%) in kernel space (I/Os, device drivers, etc.), normalized as per CPU cores quantity

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("system_seconds"),1s)/MAX("cores_count") AS "SUB" FROM "long"."cpu_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - System

panels.description: User CPU load ~ time spent (%) in user space (actual computation), normalized as per CPU cores quantity

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_seconds"),1s)/MAX("cores_count") AS "SUB" FROM "long"."cpu_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - User

panels.description: Nice CPU load ~ time spent (%) in (re)niced user space (actual computation), normalized as per CPU cores quantity

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("nice_seconds"),1s)/MAX("cores_count") AS "SUB" FROM "long"."cpu_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: CPU - Nice

panels.description: Memory used (not reclaimable), respective (%) to total memory

targets.query: SELECT 1-${AGGR}("available_bytes")/MAX("total_bytes") FROM "long"."mem_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Memory - Unavailable

panels.description: Memory used, including (reclaimable) buffers and cache, respective (%) to total memory

targets.query: SELECT 1-${AGGR}("free_bytes")/MAX("total_bytes") FROM "long"."mem_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Memory - Used

panels.description: Swap memory used, respective (%) to total swap memory

targets.query: SELECT 1-${AGGR}("swap_free_bytes")/MAX("swap_total_bytes") FROM "long"."mem_info" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Memory - Swap

panels.description: Writes time spent waiting for device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("writes_elapsed_seconds"))/NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("writes_completed_count")) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - WR:latency

panels.description: Writes bytes, actually written to device

targets.query: SELECT 512*${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("writes_sectors_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - WR:throughput

panels.description: Writes operations, completed by kernel space

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("writes_completed_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - WR:iops

panels.description: Reads time spent waiting for device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("reads_elapsed_seconds"))/NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("reads_completed_count")) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - RD:latency

panels.description: Reads bytes, actually read/written from/to device

targets.query: SELECT 512*${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("reads_sectors_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - RD:throughput

panels.description: Reads operations, completed by kernel space

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("reads_completed_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_disk" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Disk - RD:iops

panels.description: Writes time spent waiting for server to complete remote procedure calls (RPC)

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("rpc_write_elapsed_total_seconds"))/NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("rpc_write_requested_count")) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - WR:latency

panels.description: Writes bytes, actually sent to server

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("io_writes_server_bytes"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - WR:throughput

panels.description: Writes remote procedure calls (RPC), requested from server

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("rpc_write_requested_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - WR:iops

panels.description: Reads time spent waiting for server to complete remote procedure calls (RPC)

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("rpc_read_elapsed_total_seconds"))/NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE(LAST("rpc_read_requested_count")) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - RD:latency

panels.description: Reads bytes, actually received from server

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("io_reads_server_bytes"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - RD:throughput

panels.description: Reads remote procedure calls (RPC), requested from server

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("rpc_read_requested_count"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."io_mount_nfs" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","path") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: NFS - RD:iops

panels.description: Transmitted bytes (per second)

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("tx_bytes"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."net_dev" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Network - TX:throughput

panels.description: Received bytes (per second)

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("SUB") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("rx_bytes"),1s) AS "SUB" FROM "long"."net_dev" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host","device") WHERE ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Network - RX:throughput

panels.description: Established TCP (IPv4) connections

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("tcp4_established_count") FROM "long"."net_conn" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Network - TCPv4:established

panels.description: Established TCP (IPv6) connections

targets.query: SELECT ${AGGR}("tcp6_established_count") FROM "long"."net_conn" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/ AND "serie" =~ /^${Serie}$/ AND ${timeFilter} GROUP BY time(${__interval}),"host"

panels.title: Network - TCPv6:established

list.name: Task
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu_load" WITH KEY = "task"

list.name: Serie
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu_load" WITH KEY = "serie" WHERE "task" =~ /^${Task}$/
